page.title: 16Foliejon Park Farm-2.
page.content: The land is ploughed in the autumn and the winter wheat is sown soon after. When we visited the farm{wheat}was growing in 150 acres. There were 100 acres of barley,40 of oats,30 of broad beans,100 of grass and 20 were fallow. Most of the grass is mown to provide hay for the animals.It is baled and stored in the large barns with the help of an elevator.The remaining {grass}is used for pasture.When the crops have been harvested they are dried in an oil fired grain drier. The grain is then fine-milled for feeding to the animals. A mill and mix feed is given to the pigs. The{oats and barley pass through a crusher and are fed to the cattle with{added minerals.}Much machinery is used on the farm, the diesal-driven tractors are used with various attachments such as a plough,a harrow, a cultivator and a drill.
